title: QHotels appoints John Angus as Regional General Manager
text:
QHotels appoints John Angus as Regional General Manager QHotels appoints John Angus as Regional General Manager Details Category: Appointments   15:45 Award-winning hotel group, QHotels, has promoted John Angus to Regional General Manager for Warwickshire and Gloucestershire, overseeing the corporate and leisure operations at four of the group’s 27 hotels. As Regional General Manager, John will oversee the award-winning 4 star hotels and Conference and events venues in some of Britain’s most beautiful towns and countryside: Chesford Grange in Warwickshire, The Stratford and Stratford Manor in Stratford-upon-Avon and The Cheltenham Chase Hotel in Gloucestershire. 
John is also General Manager at Chesford Grange, managing the hotel’s extensive corporate operations - with 13 conference and event spaces holding up to 700 people - as well as the hotel’s 205 bedrooms, restaurant and spa and leisure facilities. After almost two years with QHotels, following previous roles in the industry, John’s appointment as Regional General Manager comes after successfully managing QHotels’ Forest Pines Hotel & Golf Resort in Lincolnshire. On his appointment, John said: “I am extremely privileged to continue to develop my role at QHotels, joining the excellent team at Chesford Grange and overseeing four unique venues within the region to ensure we’re constantly enhancing our service to deliver the very best experience.” Michael Purtill, Managing Director at QHotels, said: “Chesford Grange is one of the largest conference and events venues in the QHotels group and demands the highest level of experience and expertise to maintain its exacting standards. John has proved himself to be the ideal choice for the job, helping to elevate the guest experience even further, and now he’s able to bring his passion and expertise to the hotels across the wider region.” Related articles
